rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a corridor that directs the family to the living and dining areas while ensuring smooth flow as per Vastu guidelines.
An expansive open-plan area combining living and dining spaces. Designed with high ceilings and ample natural light to enhance energy according to Chettinad style.
A modern yet traditional kitchen integrated into the living space. It includes adequate storage and a layout that adheres to Vastu principles by keeping it away from the main entry.
Serves as an extra bedroom or study for joint family members, ensuring privacy while maintaining connectivity with common areas.
A spacious outdoor swimming pool area integrated with a patio. The design is in line with Chettinad aesthetics and offers leisure space respecting local architectural norms.

openings.description: A grand entrance door that aligns with Vastu principles by facing the auspicious direction and allowing a smooth flow of positive energy.
Large windows to allow ample natural light and ventilation. Designed in traditional Chettinad style with ornamental detailing that also facilitates energy flow.
Balconies providing natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu guidelines while ensuring privacy.

additional_info.vastu_considerations: Entrance facing east or north; kitchen away from the main entry; balanced use of space to enhance energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
